concept.title: Quiz: Short Descriptions
concept.shortdesc: Test your understanding of the structure, purpose, and best practices of DITA short descriptions.

conbody.p: 1. What is the main goal of a short description in DITA?

li.b: b) To summarize the topic for readers and improve navigation

conbody.p: 2. What is the optimal length range for effective short descriptions?
3. Where should the <shortdesc> element appear in a topic file?

li.b: c) Directly after the title, before the body

ul.li: d) At the end of the topic

conbody.p: 4. Which short description pattern is most appropriate for task topics?

ul.li: a) Brief definition + why it matters

li.b: b) Goal statement + when to perform

conbody.p: 5. What makes a short description ineffective?

ul.li: a) It is two sentences long

li.b: b) It restates the title without adding value

ul.li: d) It uses clear, concise language
